name: FLAT CUBE!
description:
This free game is a 2D interpretation of good known and favourite Rubik cube, upgraded into new model.

Pass the game levels and develop your mind.


Main mission is to create a stroke or column from black blocks by rotating the selected squares in plane. As far as you progress, the scale of field and marked squares change. The fewer moves, the higher score is. By every move think over twice as every level has hidden enigma insight.
Some complicated levels could be done by 2-3 genius moves, which are very simple. At the same time symmetric and harmonic levels require qualified skills.

If you are in deadlock, you always can use new stylish and unrivalled tips for our game mechanics.

Some unique game features:
Gameplay
Red color makes stressed our chief developer, that’s why it’s strictly prohibited to twist red blocks
There are 120 unique levels
Hint “TIP” allows move marked black block to convenient place that can resolve the level task
Hint “EYE” activate “the helicopter view” for specific level, enable you to restore the developer’s plan for this level
Hint for the first move at each level let you find the correct direction
